title: WTB or trade for 150/350 series Old Mill HOFers (some cool trade stuff posted)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: WTB or trade for 150/350 series Old Mill HOFers (some cool trade stuff posted)
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to round out my first series HOF collection with some Old Mills (also looking for Hindus, but didn't want to clutter this thread up too much).  I can purchase or trade.  Please let me know via PM or email (lukealyon@gmail.com) if you have any of these available.  I bet we can work something out.

Thanks for looking!

Note:  Most of these are not for sale, and there are a couple I don't really want to trade.  The Cy Young is only available if I am getting an Old Mill Cy Young (or maybe a Matty portrait) in return.


Looking for these Old Mills:

Bender portrait
Bresnahan portrait
Brown Cubs on shirt
Chesbro
Crawford throwing
Clarke portrait
Clarke batting
Davis
Evers portrait
Flick
Griffith portrait
Jennings portrait
Joss portrait
Keeler portrait
Keeler batting
Lajoie portrait
Lajoie throwing
Marquard hands at sides
Matty portrait
Matty white cap
McGraw portrait no cap
McGraw finger in air
Tinker portrait
Tinker hands on knees
Waddell throwing
Wallace
Walsh
Willis portrait
Young portrait
Young bare hand
